channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 00:50 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 00:50 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.#Kherson_Blast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 23:56 Driven the alarm to the Rivne region.Creck on further messages.
